titles.title: To amend the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act to expand the fruit and vegetable pilot program to 5 States, including New York, and to include Head Start programs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Education Reform.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

bill.summary: 1/4/2005--Introduced. Amends the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act to: (1) expand the fruit and vegetable pilot program to five States, including New York; and (2) include Head Start programs (as well as elementary and secondary schools) in the program.
